name: Run for your time!
description:
Run for your time is a rogue-like game made for Community Gamejam, themed "Time". You are a lost soul in an underworld that is given a second chance: finish five levels of a dungeon packed with enemies and traps, and you are free! But you have a limited amount of time, it is running out, and enemies and traps are going to decreace the time even further! Use various power-ups to assist you.

Due to personal reasons, our team couldn't finish this game in the amount of time given for this Game Jam, so look at it like a prototype. 

Team:

Vseslav Kochenov - idea, programming, sound design

Alexey Bakhtiyev, Dea Iridia & Noorwegen - art

Source code available here: https://github.com/RusAD32/JamTime

Some of the sounds were taken from https://freesound.org/ and https://www.aturaxaudio.com
